Question: In 1995, the centennial of the death of this person, the New York Times ran an article titled "this person's Deception".
Hints: This person was born on December 27, 1822, in Dole in the Jura region of France, into the family of a poor tanner.
This person was an average student in his early years, but he was gifted in drawing and painting.
This person's doctoral thesis on crystallography attracted the attention of W T.
